transport.question: I have wheels and you sit inside. Vroom vroom! What am I?

hints.text: 👪 Lots of families have one.
🚦 You need to wear a seatbelt in me.
🔑 I need a key to start.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You need to balance when using me.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.
🛣️ I'm fun to ride on a path!

transport.question: I carry many people and stop at bus stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I can take you to school.
🅿️ You need a ticket to ride me.
🛑 I am usually very long.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I land at an airport.
🌎 You can travel to different countries with me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people and goods. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I stop at train stations.
🚂 I can be very long.
💨 Sometimes I blow steam.

transport.question: I zoom through the water. Some are small, some are very big. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 You can see me on the sea or a lake.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
⛵ I might have sails.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a very loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 Firefighters ride in me.
🚨 My siren goes 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'
💧 I carry water to spray on fires.

transport.question: I have a motor, two wheels, and you have to wear a helmet to ride me.

hints.text: 🧑‍💼 You usually sit astride me.
🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle but not as big as a car
🛣️ I am fun to ride on the open road!

transport.question: I fly in the sky with spinning blades on top and can land almost anywhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I'm smaller than an airplane.
🏥 Sometimes, I help sick people get to the hospital quickly.
🛬 I don't need a long runway to land.

transport.question: I travel to space! I'm very fast and go really far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am much faster than an airplane!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌕 I can go to the moon!

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat grass in a field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 People drink what I make.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
🐘 I am very big and grey.

animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ I can be black, white, or orange.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat leaves from acacia trees.

animal.question: I croak and jump, and like to eat flies. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I start as a tadpole.
💦 I live near water.
🐞 I catch insects with my tongue.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look like a horse.
🦓 Each of us has a unique stripe pattern.
🌍 I graze on grasslands.

animal.question: I waddle and quack, and love to swim in ponds. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I hatch from an egg.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🍞 People often feed me bread.

animal.question: I roar and I'm called the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a mane.
🌍 I live in Africa.
👑 I am a very strong cat.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have many sharp teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are scared of me.
🌊 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I am a predator with powerful jaws.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🦘 I am a marsupial.
🌱 I eat plants and roots.
